name: Pizza Pandemonium (jaspercmurphy, jehorak, aquafroq, evilglutton, trendywalnut)
name_original: Pizza Pandemonium (jaspercmurphy, jehorak, aquafroq, evilglutton, trendywalnut)
description:
Can you keep up with the onslaught of orders aboard your deep-space pizzeria? Quickly top the pizzas according to the customers' wishes and instantly cook them with your flamethrower arm!

Team F(art) Smellas:

Connor Blankenship - Programming/Design

Weston Wright - Programming/Design

Joseph Horak - Programming/Design

Jordan Pak - Art

Kelly Shen - Art/Animation

Jasper Murphy - Music/SFX
